panel.name: General

check_box.label: Where applicable, save Vanity settings per-account.
check_box.tool_tip: Saves settings per-account, allowing easier customization for alts.
check_box.name: use_account_settings_check

check_box.label: Hide the Teleport progress screens
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, the viewer will hide the teleport progress screen, allowing you to continue to read IMs.
check_box.name: disable_tp_screen_check

check_box.label: Play the Teleport sound when teleporting between regions
check_box.tool_tip: Viewer will play the wooshing TP noise on teleport.
check_box.name: tp_sound_check

check_box.label: Hide the Login/Logout progress screens
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, the viewer will hide the login/logout progress screen.
check_box.name: disable_logout_screen_check

check_box.label: Disable chat, whisper and shout animations
check_box.tool_tip: Remove chat animations from your own avatar. Effect visible to everyone
check_box.name: disable_chat_animation

check_box.label: Add attachments and wearables instead of replacing them
check_box.tool_tip: When double clicking or pressing enter in inventory with wearables or objects selected they will be added to your outfit, instead of replacing the wearable or object currently at their target destination.
check_box.name: add_not_replace

check_box.label: Animate when going into Appearance Mode
check_box.name: customize_anim

check_box.label: Turn around when walking backwards
check_box.tool_tip: Certain AOs may turn you around even with this disabled.
check_box.name: turn_around

check_box.label: Announce when someone takes a snapshot
check_box.tool_tip: Won't announce for people who hide the fact that they are taking a snapshot.
check_box.name: announce_snapshots

check_box.label: Announce music stream's metadata in local chat when tuned in
check_box.tool_tip: When a new song comes on, a message will be displayed in local chat with available information about the track.
check_box.name: announce_stream_metadata

check_box.label: Let scripts steal focus when they can't compile due to errors
check_box.name: script_errors_steal_focus

check_box.label: Auto-minimize region restart notice
check_box.name: region_restart_minimized
check_box.tool_tip: Useful for sim owners and people who need to pack up before leaving
